Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: SHUTTLE DISCOVERY'S LAST MISSION
Clip.EpisodeSummary: With more than 27 years of service, the space shuttle Discovery has clocked more time in space than any other shuttle. She has flown more than 148 million miles, and has become one of the most storied spacecraft in American history. Join us as we celebrate her remarkable past and follow her final flight: to the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum. It's an emotionally charged mission full of logistical challenges. Discovery is a robust, but very fragile aircraft, and getting her to D.C. in one piece will require some innovative engineering.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the Gulf of St. Lawrence, one of the East Coast's hidden wonders lies below - the Magdalene Islands - offering some of the region's top beaches, grassy hillsides and spectacular cliff faces.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Emanuelle takes a trip across Turkey.

Clip.Title: RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See how this river gives birth to to a beautiful Oasis in the middle of the African Desert.

Clip.Title: ISLAM AND THE WEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In this 3-part series, investigate the proliferation of Islam into Europe and beyond.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Her husband lies wounded, unable to walk, so Laura Secord sets out on a long journey to warn the British of a possible American attack.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tecumseh forges an alliance with the British in pursuit of his dream of a unified First Nations.

Clip.Title: ASIA'S MONARCHIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey to the heart of these beautiful lands to understand the relationship between the people and their monarchs.

Clip.Title: BEER IS CHEAPER THAN THERAPY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Kill 30 people and you're a serial killer. But do it in war and you're a hero. This documentary examines the mental health crisis in US soldiers returning from deployment who suffer from depression, alcoholism, and alarming rates of suicide.

Clip.Title: IRELAND'S NAZIS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This extraordinary one hour documentary special investigates the cases of high-ranking Nazis who sought refuge in post-war neutral Ireland.

Clip.Title: ASIA'S MONARCHIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey to the heart of these beautiful lands to understand the relationship between the people and their monarchs.
